entry.title: Friday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow along exposed areas of the coast. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 7.
